lines.text: let a , b , c , sum , d be integers with sum is equal to 0 , d is equal to 0
lines.code: int a , b , c , sum = 0 , d = 0 ;

lines.text: for ( int i = 1 each time , increase i value by 1 )
if ( ( i * 1 + i * 2 is greater than or equal to c ) or ( i * 4 is greater than c ) or ( i * 2 is greater than b ) or ( i is greater than a ) ) , then stop
let sum is equal to ( i * 1 + i * 2 + i * 4 )

mod_code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= time ; i ++ )
